actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 98-235.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 229 - 183 (Record Vote No: 176).

official_title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against consideration of the bill (H.R. 3191) making appropriations for the Treasury Department, the United States Postal Service, the Executive Office of the President, and certain Independent Agencies, for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1984, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Waives points of order against the consideration of H.R. 3191 (appropriations).

titles.title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against consideration of the bill (H.R. 3191) making appropriations for the Treasury Department, the United States Postal Service, the Executive Office of the President, and certain Independent Agencies, for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1984, and for other purposes.
